## Hi there!

I am **Vestin** a PhD Candidate in Demography at the University of Geneva

I am a **R Fanatic** and a **Nim enthusiast**!

Outside of **R** and **Nim** I also use/learn other programming languages for different purpose:

-   **Julia** for computational heavy tasks and Bayesian inferences (but Stan is amazing!)

-   **JavaScript** for visualization especialy with **D3.js** and **P5.js**

-   **Python** for advanced Web scraping and Manim animation (very handy by the way)

I use this blog mainly to post my **visualization** as a learning process, I hope you will like the sight!
